author: Special Correspondent
title: Farmers urged not to panic
description: Harvested crop would be procured at the village itself, say ministers
content:
Panchayat Raj Minister Errabelli Dayakar Rao has assured the farmers that the State government would buy all their produce and asked them not to get panicky.
He said due to lockdown to fight coronavirus pandemic the agricultural markets were closed down. Now… [+994 chars]
